content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: Hello, thank you for considering my apartment. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price to maximize my gains. Can you please provide me with a proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, of course. The monthly rental price for this apartment is 800 Euros.
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros for the monthly rental of this apartment. Thank you for your offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Great, that's good. What's your availability for signing the lease agreement?
name: Ryanah Rahman

content: I am available to sign the lease agreement next week, on Monday at 10:00 AM.
name: Heinrich Heine
